Description: Yellow-brown pottery ostracon: af fragment of vase. On one side (convex) only, almost illegible traces of nine lines of text, probably a letter on agricultural matters.
Curator's comments: For the expression ḥryt nt prt, 'dung for (of) the winter', cf. R.A. Caminos, 'Late-Egyptian Miscellanies' (Oxford, 1954), pp. 135 and 167.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (388684) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/388684)
